component.text:
Practice Scenario

Refer to the exhibit. A single access list needs to be created to deny the 10.10.1.0/24 and the 10.10.20.0/24 subnet from reaching the 10.10.30.0/24 subnet. The host 10.10.1.1 should have access to the FTP server only. The rest of the 10.0.0.0 network should have access to the 10.10.30.0/24 network. All users should be able to access the Internet.

Use the information contained in the diagram to answer the five questions shown on the question tab.
